# Commonware Library

> Version: 0.0.0 (commit: 863cbda)

## Documentation

- [README](/code/v0.0.0/README.md): Read about the Commonware Library.
- [AGENTS.md](/code/v0.0.0/AGENTS.md): Learn about development guidelines and best practices.
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](/code/v0.0.0/CONTRIBUTING.md): Understand the expectations for contributing to this repository.
- [Blogs](/blogs.html): Provide context on design decisions and implementation details for a selection of novel primitives.

## Source Code

- [broadcast](/code/v0.0.0/broadcast/README.md): Disseminate data over a wide-area network.
- [codec](/code/v0.0.0/codec/README.md): Serialize structured data.
- [coding](/code/v0.0.0/coding/README.md): Encode data to enable recovery from a subset of fragments.
- [collector](/code/v0.0.0/collector/README.md): Collect responses to committable requests.
- [conformance](/code/v0.0.0/conformance/README.md): Automatically assert the stability of encoding and mechanisms over time.
- [consensus](/code/v0.0.0/consensus/README.md): Order opaque messages in a Byzantine environment.
- [cryptography](/code/v0.0.0/cryptography/README.md): Generate keys, sign arbitrary messages, and deterministically verify signatures.
- [deployer](/code/v0.0.0/deployer/README.md): Deploy infrastructure across cloud providers.
- [math](/code/v0.0.0/math/README.md): Create and manipulate mathematical objects.
- [p2p](/code/v0.0.0/p2p/README.md): Communicate with authenticated peers over encrypted connections.
- [resolver](/code/v0.0.0/resolver/README.md): Resolve data identified by a fixed-length key.
- [runtime](/code/v0.0.0/runtime/README.md): Execute asynchronous tasks with a configurable scheduler.
- [storage](/code/v0.0.0/storage/README.md): Persist and retrieve data from an abstract store.
- [stream](/code/v0.0.0/stream/README.md): Exchange messages over arbitrary transport.

## Examples

- [examples/bridge](/code/v0.0.0/examples/bridge/README.md): Send succinct consensus certificates between two networks.
- [examples/chat](/code/v0.0.0/examples/chat/README.md): Send encrypted messages to a group of friends.
- [examples/estimator](/code/v0.0.0/examples/estimator/README.md): Simulate mechanism performance under realistic network conditions.
- [examples/flood](/code/v0.0.0/examples/flood/README.md): Spam peers deployed to AWS EC2 with random messages.
- [examples/log](/code/v0.0.0/examples/log/README.md): Commit to a secret log and agree to its hash.
- [examples/reshare](/code/v0.0.0/examples/reshare/README.md): Reshare a threshold secret over an epoched log.
- [examples/sync](/code/v0.0.0/examples/sync/README.md): Synchronize state between a server and client.

## Paths

- Versioned (stable): /code/v0.0.0/
- Main branch (commit-specific): /code/main/863cbda/

View [sitemap.xml](/sitemap.xml) for all filepaths.
